title: tiles problem instance
description: Information regarding a problem instance and its solutions

format.description: Interpretation of tile values. Either Tile at position = ARRAY[position] (pos_ind) or Position of tile = ARRAY[TILE] (val_ind).

init.description: Initial board state. Must be height*width in size and contain numbers 0 to height*width.

goal.description: Goal board state. Must be in same format as format/init.

info.description: Information about the solution. Optimal, etc.

operators.description: Sequence of operators. These are positions the blank tile moves to.
